about_the_game:
BERSERKER'S DOMAIN is a fast-paced, unhinged retro FPS freakshow with a roguelike loop, inspired by classics like Blood, Quake 1-3, and Doom, as well as modern shooters like Dusk, ULTRAKILL, and Doom Eternal.

You’ve died — only to be unleashed into an afterlife full of ultraviolence, explosions, gibs, fun, and fresh victims!

  • Run, dash, and double-jump around the battlefield at break-neck speed, tearing through swarms of cultists, demons, monsters, soldiers, sorcerers, and demigods. 

  • Wield a brutal arsenal of nasty-ass weapons, each with a bunch of nonsense upgrades.

  • Unlock ultimate "pair upgrades" that combine bonuses from different weapons. Want a Dynamite that explodes into shotgun pellets? Sure, why not.

Press the Play button and you're shooting stuff in 5 seconds.

  • No menus, no waiting for load screens, no tutorials. Just run the game and have fun.

  • Each death starts a new, randomized run with fresh maps, weapons, upgrades, and enemies. No two runs are ever the same.

Run. Hunt. RAMPAGE

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains depictions of violence - specifically combat scenes including firearms, melee weapons, blood and gore.

No load screens, tutorials or menus - just click Play and you're shooting stuff in 5 seconds. Quick play sessions and randomized runs for endless mindless fun.
